CustomField.description: The site URL which is used to accept or decline the event invitation email (e.g - https://datacoladasfzoom-developer-edition.ap5.force.com/).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the site URL which is used to accept or decline the event invitation email (e.g - https://datacoladasfzoom-developer-edition.ap5.force.com/).
CustomField.label: Site URL
